00056 class Condition
00057 {
00058 public:
00059         Condition();
00060 
00061         void init(CharType type, vector<CharType>& preTypes, vector<CharType>& noPreTypes,
00062                                 vector<CharType>& NextTypes, vector<CharType>& noNextTypes,
00063                                 set<CharValue>& nextChars, bool isEnd = false);
00064 
00065         CharType getType() const
00066         {
00067                 return type_;
00068         }
00069 
00073         bool match( CharType preType, CharValue nextValue, CharType nextType ) const;
00074 
00078         bool equals( Condition& other );
00079 
00080     friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& sout, const Condition& cond )
00081     {
00082         sout<<"type: "<<cond.type_<<", ";
00083         sout<<"isPre: "<<cond.isSetPreTypes_;
00084         if(cond.isSetPreTypes_)
00085         {
00086                 sout<<" ( ";
00087                 for( int i = 0; i < CHAR_TYPE_NUM; ++i )
00088                         sout<<!cond.noPreTypes_[i]<<", ";
00089                 sout<<")";
00090         }
00091 
00092         sout<<", isNext: "<<cond.isSetNextTypes_;
00093         if(cond.isSetNextTypes_)
00094         {
00095                 sout<<" ( ";
00096                 for( int i = 0; i < CHAR_TYPE_NUM; ++i )
00097                         sout<<!cond.noNextTypes_[i]<<", ";
00098                 sout<<")";
00099         }
00100 
00101         const set<CharValue>& nextChars = cond.nextChars_;
00102         sout<<", nextCharSize: "<<nextChars.size();
00103 
00104         if( !nextChars.empty() )
00105                 {
00106                         sout<<" ( ";
00107                         for( set<CharValue>::const_iterator itr = nextChars.begin();
00108                                         itr != nextChars.end(); ++itr )
00109                                 sout<<getDecodeChar( *itr )<<", ";
00110                         sout<<")";
00111                 }
00112 
00113         sout<< ", isEnd: " << cond.isEnd_;
00114         return sout;
00115     }
00116 
00117 private:
00121         void setTypesArray(bool& isSegFlag, bool *noTypes, vector<CharType>& allowTypes,
00122                         vector<CharType>& forbidTypes);
